portfolio.title: Speech to Text App
portfolio.description: i Have made this Amazing tool which convert your speeking word's to Text. Where User can click the button to start Recording and Stop recording and user can Copy to Clipboard and paste at anywhere ********************* Using React js, Node Package's, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Material UI

portfolio.title: Movie Review (IMDb clone)
portfolio.description: i have made Movie review website using React, real time API. Where user can get movie review, his offical IMDb rating, moview photo's and description. I have provided 3 category's of movies, Popular, Top Rated, Upcoming... in this project i have learnd how to use API, Axios, Routing in Live Project's

portfolio.title: My Restruant Website
portfolio.description: Before COVID, I had started my own startup in Indore, my own Restruant. For which I HAD made the website of my restaurant. using React js, react Hook's, react router, Material UI, javaScript, HTML5, CSS3. it was my firt real time project.. i have learnd very much after this project.
